sentences.sentence: "This is an excellent study" says Dennis Bramble an evolutionary morphologist at the University of Utah in Salt Lake City.
sentences.translation: “这是一项很出色的研究。”来自盐湖城的犹他州立大学的形态学家丹尼斯·布拉姆布说道。
